attributes.action: We demand a better deal for women in sport
attributes.additional_details:
As part of Stylist's Fair Game For Women In Sport Campaign, we’re tackling the following:

•	Research by the Women’s Sport & Fitness Foundation shows that women’s sport receives less than 5% of all sports coverage which makes it hard to attract the commercial partners it needs.
•	By the time girls leave school, they are only half as likely to reach the recommended activity levels as boys.
•	Other WSFF research shows that an increased media profile helps create role models to inspire girls.

The government should consider:
•	Requesting that sports use part of their public funding to deliver media strategies for women’s sport.
•	Including a women’s sport event on the list of protected events shown on free-to-air TV.
•	Strengthening the responsibilities of public broadcasters such as the BBC and Channel 4.

Take a stand against sexism. Sign below and change the future.
